answers.answer: Girl I am up every other hour. Rather its to pee or for no reason at all. I hope baby girl comes early cause my lil tummy is to its max! She is already measuring a month early. I go for a ultrasound in two weeks.
I'm not being able to sleep either my baby boy is measuring 10 days ahead and I'm hoping he comes early too I'm 30 weeks and 1 day now but I feel like I'm about to pop
Yeah, im 30 weeks 1 day too! Im ready for this to be over with lol.

I feel ya it doesn't help that I'm always running after my 11 1/2 month old trying to keep him out of stuff but luckily I'm having a scheduled csection at 39 weeks anyway I just have a feeling he's going to come before then
oh im miserable, madi come out already! haha.
Yes I have to keep up with my 24 month old and he still don't sleep good at night. Ready to have her an be normal again lol
Lol im 28 wks and feel like im guna pop too... Oct couldnt come any slower!!!
Lol, october needs to hurry!

I go for another ultrasound on tuesday to c how big baby is.. Im nervous cause my first was 12lbs 7oz... Feel bigger with this one... Just anxious to know what the us says. When did u ladies get ur gd test? I think hes guna send me for that too on tuesday, worried abojt that too...

Yep i'm 30+2 and cant sleep no matter what I try. I end up staying up for days then just sleeping for like 2days straight. Only waking to eat, drink n pee haha. My morning sickness has made a very unwelcome return :-( hate feeling sick but it'll all be worth it when my lil girl gets her. Her due dates 16th oct xxx
Ya I went for my gd already it came back good... This is baby number four an all my babies were under 7 pnds. So me measuring a whole month ahead has me a lil scared lol
Omg! 12lbs?

Yeah id b worried measuring a month ahead but u never know the baby could be in a weird position id wait to see what measurements say on ur next apt.Yeah 12 and 1/2 lbs... The neonatalogist for my son said it must have been gd  developed later in my pregnancy, i think it was preeclampsia cause i had high bp and really swollen. Being monitored closely this time so im not as worried but with either its common to comeback in 2nd pregnancyso we will see i guess.
I am up all night to pee! & when I'm trying to fall asleep is when my baby loves to go crazy in my belly. Other than that I feel great! I'm due the 3rd and soooo ready!
Due Oct 1 and the sleepless nights just set in. Up to pee and up from strong movements then can not go back to sleep.

My bf jokes and says that he just makes football players... Kind of annoying vause he acts like he wants this one to b bigger... Is he f'in nuts and realize i have to carry.this baby and i dont want this one to b stuck in nicu for wks cause no one has experience with huge newborns and they think something is wrong with him when hes was super healthy

I've kept my measuring here at home an I knew before hand I was bigger than Wat I was sapose to be. I hope if she is big that they will induce early. I am DEATHLY scared to push out a big baby lol I am tiny so big baby an me just don't suit each other :):)
I'm due Oct 18 and sleep and round ligament pain with heartburn/acid reflex *****!! I am so ready for my son!! He is measuring 4 days ahead

My advice is if u are meauring big to ask dr to give u an ultrasound at 39wks to c how big the baby is. I didnt have one with my first, im sure if i did i would have.had a sched c section and not have gone through all the labor and pushing unessesarily before they realize hes too big
I got my gd test done at 28 weeks it came back normal :)
I'm.30+1. It's Getting Hard Just To Turn Over. My Body Pillow Sometimes Smacks My Boyfriend At Night. Constant Heart Burn. And Getting Braxton Hicks Contractions More Often. I'm So Tired..
Yes I have a US in two weeks to check her weight....

I'm 31+3 and sleeping ***** so bad! I toss and turn all night and can't lay on one side for too long without my hips/legs going numb. Not to mention all the pee breaks also..  I began to waddle and are now starting to get a few stretch marks -_-  But other than that everything is great! I'm just ready my little man to be here! Due October 8 (:
Im due Oct 31st so I'm 28+1. I constantly wake up at night and roll from side to side. And my feet are starting to hurt and swell a lot more. Ready for my second little girl to be here.

I am almost 29weeks and due on the 28th. sleeping more then a hr or two at a time is a blessing... i just cant get comfortable or im being sick arghh just preparing me for the lack of sleep when my bubba arrives i want October to hurry up already i really do not like being pregnant
Ugh last night I was sound asleep only to wake up to her on my sciatic nerve ouch.

question: How are yall feeling lately? Is getting harder to sleep, all this constant moving around from side to side in my sleep. Lol, I just want to have my son already.
title: October moms to be.
